name: 余炳盛
objective:
理解礦物生成之物理及化學因素及其晶體結構與物理性質間之關係，並瞭解如何將礦物學應用於地球科學與晶體材料之合成與生長，其大綱內容如下：
1.礦物相平衡與相變化：相圖、Polymorphic reactions, Exsolusion processes, Polytype
2.雙晶、結構缺陷
3.物理性質：顏色、電性、磁性、放射性
4.晶體結構：幾何結晶學、結晶形態、原子排列與對稱、空間群
5.礦物分析：礦物相與化學成份分析
schedule:
第1週：Introduction, the study of mineral as part of earth science, mineral science, definition of mineral, history of mineralogy, economic importance of minerals.
第2週：Physical properties of minerals in hand specimen (1): crystal form and crystal habit, intergrowth, twins, and striations, state of aggregation, luster, color, and streak. 
第3週：Physical properties of minerals in hand specimen (2): play of color, chatoyancy and asterism, luminescence, fluorescence, cleavage, parting, fracture.
第4週：Physical properties of minerals in hand specimen (3): hardness, tenacity, specific gravity, magnetism, radioactive, solubility in HCl, piezoelectricity.
第5週：Elements of crystal chemistry (1): Chemical composition of the Earth’s crust, the atom, the ion.
第6週：Elements of crystal chemistry (2): bonding forces in crystal, atomic and ionic radii, coordination of ions.
第7週：Elements of crystal chemistry (3): crystal structures, examples of common structure types.
第8週：Elements of crystal chemistry (4): compositional variation in minerals, recalculation of chemical analyses, graphic representation of mineral composition.
第9週：Mid-term exam.
第10週：Mineral reactions, stability, and behavior (1): crystallization, mineral reactions
第11週：Mineral reactions, stability, and behavior (2): mineral stability
第12週：Mineral reactions, stability, and behavior (3): polymorphic reactions, exsolution processes, metamict processes, mineraloids, pseudomorphism.
第13週：Mineral reactions, stability, and behavior (4): Structural complexities and defects, origin of color, origin of magnetic properties, origin of radioactivity.
第14週：Overview of crystallographic concepts (1): Form symmetry operations of space group, mineral as crystalline solids, crystals and specific symmetry elements.
第15週：Overview of crystallographic concepts (2): Crystal morphology, some common twins.
第16週：Overview of crystallographic concepts (3): the internal order and symmetry of minerals (1)
第17週：Overview of crystallographic concepts (4): the internal order and symmetry of minerals (2)
第18週：Final exam.
